name: Fall 2019 - 470 - Kaiju Corps
description:
Kaiju Corps is a turn based strategy game where you control 4 giant monsters and attempt to wipe out the important buildings of a city. Move around the city while attacking the vital structures, and destroy them all to win.

Select the monster you wish to control and move them around with the WASD keys, before selecting what you want to target and end the turn with F to attack. Destroy either the population centers or the science and military buildings to win before your monsters all die to win.

To play, simply download and unpack the zip file before running the executable.
